item.title: Why I'd choose Apache Wicket as a web application framework
item.author: thespamtrapp@gmail.com (Serban Balamaci)
item.description: In a short description Apache Wicketis a great stateful component based framework which cultivates a sound architecture that appeals to Java developers. This is just going to be a general summary of the points of why you might want to have a look at the framework.
